sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Man-&man-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: as, ld bzip2: bzip2 fileutils: chmod, cp, install, mkdir, mv, rm gcc: gcc grep: grep gzip: gunzip, zcat make: make mawk: awk sed: sed sh-utils: echo textutils: cat
